website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for its ability to keep cool for extended periods of time and for its compact design. The side handles make this durable mid-size cooler easy to carry.
pros: At 34 quarts, this model can handle the needs of the average-sized family while still leaving some extra packing space in the car
It maintains ice for up to three days
Even full, the cooler remains light enough for one person to carry when using the built-in side handles
cons: There is no drain on this model, so users will have to lift and pour when it's time to empty the cooler

customer_reviews.title: Great for two people
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a weekend away for two people with drinks and some food. Now that we have a baby though it’s hard to fit everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burrier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for icing down a 6-pack of your favorite drinks! Bigger coolers are too heavy for me once I get the drinks in and get ice on top of them. This keeps everything cold for hours and is so convenient to handle; I also love the camo pattern!
customer_reviews.author: 1mamaj

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Fair price, good for road travel, and just the right size. Detraction are the hand grips. They make it hard to hold and carry the ice chest for more than a few yards, especially if they are wet or damp.
customer_reviews.author: IndOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for Xmas to go with his mini side by side, so he could be like his dad. He loves it, the camo print is awesome, it fits 12 cans plus ice, is pretty lightweight and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Jentry McKell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cooler but not quite air tight as a cooler should be.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: poor handholds
customer_reviews.text: Can only lift or pull using two hands; the handholds on the sides are designed only, only for lifting. This to me is a significant nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Shantida Joseph

customer_reviews.title: LUNCH BOX
customer_reviews.text: This thing keeps things cold all day long. My partner works on construction sites. He used it through this past summer and it is super.
customer_reviews.author: BEEDOT68

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes it to work every day, and it's definitely a manly lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D'Anna

customer_reviews.title: ... frame keeps everything cold saves buying drinks as we like to travel back
customer_reviews.text: Fits on bike frame keeps everything cold saves buying drinks as we like to travel back roads
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if you're looking for a hidden cooler, this is it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's camo and cheap. Can hold almost two 30 packs with limited ice. Handles seem pretty strong. My gorgeousness thinks it's super sexy, when she can see it. A little top heavy is my only critique of this fine unit.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size cooler. Awesome camo color. Couldn't ask for a better cooler for the price. Would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Swicegood

customer_reviews.title: Loveit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the husband. Made a great Christmas present. Great for packing lunches. Great seal keeps cool. Nice pattern design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice American made lunch bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, just rinse it out. It's a solid insulated plastic lunch bucket. very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Got this one as it won't show dirt and wear and tear as easily as others. Would have liked wheels but not offered at the price. Not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: housekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler for my boyfriend to replace his old lunch box. He works 12 hour shifts so I needed something sturdy but also large enough for his 3 water bottles, lunch, dinner and snacks, this cooler worked perfectly. He said all the men loved it and wanted to know where he purchased it. Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MelindaK

customer_reviews.title: Coolest cooler
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great cooler for hauling my lunch to work every day. Its the perfect size. Most others were too big or too small but this one is just right with enough room for another small container to carry my phone charger and a few other things as well. Oh yeah, Made in the USA too. All the other guys are jealous of how sweet my lunchbox is and you should be too. Unless you have a dukes of hazzard one. Those are pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TBSS

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Said would take a month to come but took about two at xmas time. Tad smaller than a regular igloo but camo print on it is awesome color. Lid fits tight so won't open on own.
customer_reviews.author: nursetracy31

customer_reviews.title: ... free shipping immediately after I bought it so that sucked but it and looked fine
customer_reviews.text: Found out it was cheaper on Ebay and free shipping immediately after I bought it so that sucked but it and looked fine, I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Y.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Ice chest looks good with camo wrap. No drain plug. Other than that construction seems ok. Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer "Lee"

customer_reviews.title: A VERY GOOD PRODUCT/34QT.COOLER
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USE THE 34QT. RUBBERMAID MANY TIMES IN THE PAST AND HAVE FOUND THAT IT IS A VERY GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: EDDIELUNSFORD1

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay cooler, didn't notice any great difference between the ice melting quickly on this one or the one I have that is 20 years old.n
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our need. We have one much larger and a couple "carry your lunch to work" size. My only question/concern is - why isn't the lid insulated?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Please Don't BUY! The lid is not working properly.
customer_reviews.text: I received the cooler today. However, the lid is not closed firmly. It can be open easily. I don't think it will keep it cool. I am going to return this item. Note that it doesn't have a handle to carry as like other coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Seungman Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put ice in at night. Drinks were still cold the next night.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Neil

customer_reviews.title: Good for car trips
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be. Good for car trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected from Rubbermaid, not insulated, no exit plug..... just your typical cooler.
customer_reviews.author: T818-Hard2Please

customer_reviews.title: camo lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid lunch box is quality made. It keeps items cool all day in extreme heat conditions am very suprised. Lid closes securely. Only fault I can find is its a little to small. Needs to be 14 or 15 quart instead of 10 to be able to pack more h2o.
customer_reviews.author: mt22mag

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift for the hubby who desperately needed a new lunch box/cooler and he loves it! He's a carpenter by trade but a hunter by choice, so this is a perfect accessory for him.
customer_reviews.author: CountryGirl

customer_reviews.title: cooler
customer_reviews.text: i realy love this cooler its the right size for side by side or atv and its very light and camoed
customer_reviews.author: hunter38

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: c.gentry

customer_reviews.title: Will out last an Igloo
customer_reviews.text: I actually got one free about 15 years ago. A friend worked for Coke and had one left over from a Powerade display. It has out lasted several Igloo ice chest. The outer plastic (on the igloo) seems to start cracking after several years and needs replacement parts occasionally. The Rubbermaid is still in very (near new) good condition. Have not even needed replacement parts. It is great for a day (maybe two) use ice chest.
customer_reviews.author: dbruce

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Ice chest
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the cooler yet, but it seems to be of good quality. It should work nice for sporting activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Cooler, 34 Quart, Blue FG2A2002MODBL
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:34-quartGreat for sporting events and outdoor activities. Holds 48 cans plus ice. Durable, crack-resistant polyethylene jacket resists scratching, denting, fading, and odors. Extra-Thick urethane-based foam insulation has superior thermal retention to keep your drink cool. Inside liner is easy to clean. Hinged lid is easy to open.
feature_bullets: Superior thermal retention keeps food and beverages cold.
Stain and odor resistant, easy-to-clean liner.
Easy-to-clean liner. Made in the USA.
